alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:08PM CDT until May 11 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Graceville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hartford, Slocomb, Malvern, Esto, Noma, Black, Fadette, Kellys Crossroads, High Bluff, Tendil Crossing, Dundee, Bald Hill, Holland Crossroads, Hendrix Crossroad, Light, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads and Noma Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
